snippet: The United States on Friday reaffirmed its military ties with Cambodia’s government, but Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta also warned the country about its long record of human rights abuses.
abstract: United States reaffirms its military ties with Cambodia’s government, but defense secretary Leon E Panetta also warns country about its long record of human rights abuses.
lead_paragraph: The United States on Friday reaffirmed its military ties with Cambodia’s government, but Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta also warned the country about its long record of human rights abuses.

headline.seo: U.S. Reaffirms Military Ties With Cambodia
headline.main: In Cambodia, Panetta Reaffirms Ties With Authoritarian Government
headline.print_headline: U.S. Reaffirms Military Ties To Cambodia

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
